Server.Room Images: Rooms now have a fancy new VS image thanks to Dreez

Server.500 Games Minimum: Due to low activity last season we will not be hosting another end of season tournament for the foreseeable future. However if a given platform has 500 games played we will consider hosting a tournament for woodskin.

Website.Previous Season Stats(coming soon): This is going to be the last big change for a while, but going to add a select to view previous season leaderboards and player stats.

ELO & Ranks.Removed Placement Games: There are no longer placement games

Admin.Leaderboard Reset Update: Leaderboard reset command updated to make admin life easier
